title: Tangent Over X Function
description:
TANC TANC function calculates the following formula:
with TANC(0) = 1.
name: TANC

input.name: X
input.description: The input real number which the tangent is computed from.

output.name: TANC
output.description: The output real number resulting from the computation of TAN(X) / X or 1.0 if X is zero.

return_value.description: The result of the tangent function divided by the input value, or 1.0 if the input is zero.
